{"item":{"at_control":"","category":"daily","description":"天赋的鸿沟有多难跨越？没能尽数你独自练习的所有时日，所以我们不得而知。但你终于还是让我们都知道了，这个鸿沟并非不可跨越。
而你甚至并没有因为走在不是“父母铺设的轨道”而捉襟见肘，你还能拿出余裕，去关心周围的人，去发现那个孤独的孩子。
也许你才是那个“没有发现自己巨大潜能的家伙”吧。
星见纯那同学，生日快乐！","id":37448415,"is_fav":0,"pictures":[{"img_height":1080,"img_size":263.66,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/c197c0d587ed0f0c16b386af793ed639870a57d4.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":1920},{"img_height":720,"img_size":128.16,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/c4fa04b893d52bb0ecbf86d67d2e032825e40934.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":960},{"img_height":540,"img_size":35.72,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/a3215e39064951fbe836e231c10aa5af9b4abb4d.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":960},{"img_height":834,"img_size":70.05,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/4d919f465acf67e3ebc62faa775b2c2e38f328fd.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":835},{"img_height":609,"img_size":64.41,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/fbd3372acc7ce943dcf759f11f0f2eec36c9616e.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":960},{"img_height":720,"img_size":150.61,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/a9f7bfe6d3064f83c314bbc0a2ce78f64c8799ee.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":960},{"img_height":360,"img_size":2819.51,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/91f1b2abdb15ccb258efb508bb008a72a0d6d035.gif","img_tags":null,"img_width":640},{"img_height":540,"img_size":47.33,"img_src":"https://i0.hdslb.com/bfs/album/299566cd994544e825df5e43b6d2e4bade4ebfb2.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":960}],"pictures_count":8,"reply":71,"role":[],"settings":{"copy_forbidden":"0"},"source":[],"title":"","upload_time":1569859490},"user":{"head_url":"https://i1.hdslb.com/bfs/face/7626da8b83eb3872860f9f9c7496a8f800c480b1.jpg","name":"圣翔音乐学院放送科","uid":234441166,"vip":{"avatar_subscript":0,"due_date":1579017600000,"label":{"label_theme":"","path":"","text":""},"nickname_color":"","status":0,"theme_type":0,"type":1,"vip_pay_type":0}}}
